doc.previous: An east west opening hyperbola can be represented parametrically by Both parameterizations may be made rational by using tangent half angle formula and setting
doc.after: A north south opening hyperbola can be represented parametrically as In all formulae h k are the center coordinates of the hyperbola a is the length of the semi major axis and b is the length of the semi minor axis
